xdeint_selftest.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains the self-test functions for the XCfa driver.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who  Date     Changes
 ----- ---- -------- ----------------------------------------------
 3.2   adk  02/13/14 First Release.
                     Added the XDeint_Selftest function.

#include "xdeint.h"
#include "xstatus.h"

Functions

int XDeint_Selftest (XDeint *InstancePtr)

Function Documentation

int XDeint_Selftest ( XDeint *  InstancePtr  ) 

This function reads Version register of Deinterlacer core and compares with zero as part of self test.

Parameters:
InstancePtr is a pointer to XDeint instance to be worked on.
Returns:
  • XST_SUCCESS if the test was successful.
  • XST_FAILURE if the test failed.
